subject: fix: use OneSignal SDK permission status for notification icon
body:
Reverted to using OneSignal SDK as the source of truth for permission status.
The native browser permission API is not accurate enough - OneSignal SDK
provides the correct state.

Changes:
- Use getOneSignalPermissionStatus() for all permission checks
- Icon updates when OneSignal SDK state changes
- Removed native browser permission checks
- Icon shows: ‚è≥ loading, üîî granted, üîï denied, üîî undetermined
